info.bliki.wiki.dump
Class WikiPatternMatcher

java.lang.Object
  info.bliki.wiki.dump.WikiPatternMatcher

public class WikiPatternMatcher
extends java.lang.Object

Can be used as a stand alone class to pattern match parts of the wiki formatted text. Copied and modified from the WikiXMLJ project.

Author:
Delip Rao modified by Axel Kramer
